page.title: 10Events in Stiffkey.
page.content: {Annual Fete}and Sheep Dog Trial: 1976, after Church fetes ended, new Fete Committee organised to raise money for building Village Hall (Â£9,000 paid off by 1982). Fete now held annually on Home Hill,Vale Farm. Subsequent donations to: street lights, Cricket Club, Wells Cottage Hospital, Ethiopia, vilage seat for Little Hill, bus shelter (proposed). Currently organising Fireworks Party.{ {Annual Parties:}Old People's Party, organised by Social Club, Christmas Party and Children's Party for members.{Carol singing}door to door organised by W.I.; Church Carol Service. {Bingo:}twice monthly: Village Bingo raises money for Village Hall; Cash Bingo finances monthly newsletter{'Stewkey Blues News'}- a result of individual initiative.
